Joy Ngozi Ezeilo bụ onye ọkà mmụta iwu Naijiria.  O guzobere Women Aid Collective (WACOL), Tamar Sexual Assault Referral Centre na West African Women's Rights Coalition (WAWORC)
Prọfesọ Ezeilo bụkwa onye na-eme ngagharị iwe na ọkà mmụta

Ọ bụ onye ritere ihenrite nke 2019 nke National Human Rights na Naịjirịa na National Honour of Officer of the Order of Niger (OON) maka ọrụ ya na enyemaka ya na mmepe mmadụ. Ọ bụkwa ugbu a osote onye isi oche nke African Women Leadership Network (AWLN) nke Naijiria ma bụrụkwa onye otu Enugu Steeti Judicial Panel of Inquiry on Police Brutality na Extra-Judicial Killings.
